becomeCustomer.title: Welcome to Atotech Shop
becomeCustomer.text: Get a faster self-service order experience without unnecesary phone calls and emails.

loginForm.loginText: Are you an existing Atotech customer? Sign in using your email and credentials.

forgotPasswordSuccess.title: Your Password has been Successfully Reset
forgotPasswordSuccess.text: Please check your email with reset instructions to setup a new password.

resetPassword.title: Setup a New Password
resetPassword.text: Password must be six characters minimum, with one uppercase letter, one number, one symbol
